name: Boogie#4 GreenRetro
description:
"GreenRetro" is the fourth gif, from the third edited NFT "TokyoNights". A painting from the studio, provided the template for the first digitally manipulated gif "StrawberryField". Like a domino effect, this series emerges as a coherent sequence, a kind of chain reaction in which the previous work is the starting point for the next. Information is lost, new information is added, similar to our daily lives. Ultimately, the finished series is to be understood as a closed circuit. 
.
3d=4d
.
.
